duties_responsibilities.duty: Develop and oversee the Business Development Team to drive business growth revenue growth in prioritized territories through interactions with existing guests and new prospects.

Supervise/management of the Business Development Managers to introduce and promote to new guests, as well as continue to build ongoing relationships, gain trust and earn repeat business with existing guests.
Lead and coach the Business Development team on best practice sales techniques for in-person meetings and telephone interactions.
Define the objectives and goals for each Business Development territory to achieve and/or exceed the overall business target.
Manage and develop the Business Development team to achieve the set goals.

Ensure there is a clear plan in place for each territory including a schedule of events and approach to database mining to deliver maximum exposure to guests and prospects with an agreed cycle of outreach for the upcoming year.
Work with the SVP Sales and Product to plan and budget hosted events; ensure compliance with the budget.

Ensure the Business Development team delivers appropriate levels of inquiries, meetings and events follow-up so that all information is correctly input into CRM system and handed over to the relevant Travel Consultant to ensure seamless prospect and guest experience.
Collaborate with all departments across Scott Dunn – both in the US and internationally.
Act as an ambassador of Scott Dunn’s values, company culture and brand messaging.

education_certification.credential: Bachelor's degree in Business Administration or related field (Master's preferred)
